title: My account is scam messaging my friends while I'm offline.
body: The past two times that I've logged on there is a chat box opened with a random person on my friends list. Its like they are having a fake conversation and linking a scam site to each other. I've never put my log in information anywhere online, and I haven't played in like two months. I'm not sure what to do or think about this. I'm gonna try and get a screenshot the next time that it happens. Help?

replies.body: I highly recommend restoring accesss to your account, with the help of our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) if necessary.  You should also take a look at our [account protection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) for some safety practices to secure your information in and outside of league.  Hopefully, this will stop the spam but let me know if you have any trouble getting onto your account.
